description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ctdg","text":"This cell line was described and characterized in the following paper: Ferguson, S.M.,  Raimondi, A., Paradise, S., Shen, H., Mesaki, K., Ferguson, A., Destaing, O., Ko, G.,  Takasaki, J., Cremona, O., O’Toole, E., De Camilli P. Coordinated actions of actin and  BAR proteins upstream of dynamin at endocytic clathrin-coated pits. Developmental  Cell 17, 811-822, 2009. PMID: 20059951]. This procedure describes tamoxifen\u0002inducible KO method using this cell line.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f96v1","text":"Culture the cells  at    and 5% CO2 in DMEM containing 10% FBS,    penicillin,   streptomycin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9kvv0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E85277F04EA211EC9203797FC5B964C6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"FC1759E04EA211EC9203797FC5B964C6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1810}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"3D2FC7A04EA311EC9203797FC5B964C6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50r1e","text":"When cells reach 80-90% confluency, detach cells from the dishes using  trypsin-EDTA and split the cells 1:4 and add   4-hydroxy-tamoxifen along with  fresh culture medium. Incubate the cells for   (48 hours). A dish with no 4- hydroxy-tamoxifen is used as a control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":117,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":196,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"17uge","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"BF7E64504EA311EC9203797FC5B964C6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"E2314BC04EA311EC9203797FC5B964C6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
